explains: n. 恃强凌弱者，横行霸道者；<非正式>腌牛肉
v. 威吓，欺侮；威胁，胁迫
wordGroup: bully for someone [口语]妙极了，好极了(用来表示嘲笑、羡慕等)

sentences.en: I fell victim to the office bully.
sentences.cn: 我成了这个办公室霸王欺负的对象。

sentences.en: I wasn't going to let him bully me.
He could alternately bully and charm people.
sentences.cn: 他能时而欺负人，时而吸引人。
